326 ContactResolver(unsigned iterations,
327 real velocityEpsilon=(real)0.01,
328 real positionEpsilon=(real)0.01);
329
334 ContactResolver(unsigned velocityIterations,
335 unsigned positionIterations,
336 real velocityEpsilon=(real)0.01,
337 real positionEpsilon=(real)0.01);
338
342 bool isValid()
343 {
344 return (velocityIterations > 0) &&
345 (positionIterations > 0) &&
346 (positionEpsilon >= 0.0f) &&
347 (positionEpsilon >= 0.0f);
348 }
349
353 void setIterations(unsigned velocityIterations,
354 unsigned positionIterations);
